trans-unit.source: Represents an association between a source <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" />, and a target object which can be a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Representa una asociación entre un objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> de origen y un objeto de destino, que puede ser un objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> o un recurso externo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> defines an association between a *source* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> to a *target* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> or external resource.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> define una asociación entre un *origen* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> a una *destino* <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> o un recurso externo.

trans-unit.source: The source object is considered the "owner" of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: El objeto de origen se considera el "propietario" de la relación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> class has no public constructor; instead, two Create methods are used:
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> clase no tiene ningún constructor público; en su lugar, se utilizan dos métodos Create:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a "package-level" relationship—from a package to a specified part or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Crea una relación de "nivel de paquete": desde un paquete para un elemento especificado o un recurso externo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a "part-level" relationship—from one part to another part or external resource.
trans-unit.target: Crea una relación de "nivel de elemento", de una parte a otra parte o un recurso externo.

trans-unit.source: The source package or part is identified by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> property of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: El paquete de origen o el elemento identificado por el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> propiedad de la relación.

trans-unit.source: The target part or external resource is identified by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> property of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: El elemento de destino o el recurso externo se identifica mediante el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> propiedad de la relación.

trans-unit.source: Creating or deleting a relationship does not affect the source or target objects in any way.
trans-unit.target: Crear o eliminar una relación no afecta a los objetos de origen o destino en modo alguno.

trans-unit.source: If a source object is deleted, all relationships owned by the object are also deleted.
trans-unit.target: Si se elimina un objeto de origen, también se eliminan todas las relaciones de propiedad del objeto.

trans-unit.source: Relationships enable navigation both in a document and between documents.
trans-unit.target: Las relaciones habilitan la navegación en un documento y entre documentos.

trans-unit.source: Relationships also support document object model services, such as linking a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> to specific document elements when printing.
trans-unit.target: Las relaciones también admiten servicios del modelo de objetos de documento, por ejemplo, vincular un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> a elementos de documento específico al imprimir.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> elements see Section 1.3 "Relationships" in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> elementos consulte 1.3 de la sección "Relaciones" en la *Open Packaging Conventions* especificación está disponible para su descarga en [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that identifies the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una cadena que identifica la relación.

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que identifica la relación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> property string is unique for all relationships owned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> package or part.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> cadena de la propiedad es único para todas las relaciones que pertenecen a la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> paquete o el elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> se especifica en la llamada a la **paquete**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: método que crea la relación.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Después de crea la relación, la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> no se puede cambiar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> property string is a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> cadena de propiedad es un identificador XML válido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)).
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.Id%2A> tipo es xsd: ID y debe seguir las convenciones de nomenclaturas prescritas en la *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* especificación (vea [ http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> que contiene esta relación.

trans-unit.source: The package that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: El paquete que contiene esta relación.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> elements see the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> elementos consulte la *Open Packaging Conventions* especificación está disponible para su descarga en [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualified type name of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre de tipo calificado de la relación.

trans-unit.source: The qualified type name of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: El nombre de tipo calificado de la relación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> se especifica en la llamada a la **paquete**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: método que crea la relación.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Después de crea la relación, la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> no se puede cambiar.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> is defined in a URI-like syntax and identifies the role of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.RelationshipType%2A> se define en una sintaxis similar a URI e identifica la función de la relación.

trans-unit.source: For example, "http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource" identifies the relationship to a target part that is a "required-resource."
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, "http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource" identifica la relación a un elemento de destino que es un "requiere recursos."

trans-unit.source: **Package-Wide Relationship Types**
trans-unit.target: **Tipos de relación de todo el paquete**

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: Relationship Type
trans-unit.target: Tipo de relación

trans-unit.source: Core Properties
trans-unit.target: Propiedades básicas

trans-unit.source: Digital Signature
trans-unit.target: Firma digital

trans-unit.source: Digital Signature Certificate
trans-unit.target: Certificado de firma digital

trans-unit.source: Digital Signature Origin
trans-unit.target: Origen de la firma digital

trans-unit.source: Thumbnail
trans-unit.target: Vista en miniatura

trans-unit.source: For more information about package relationship types see Chapter 3 and Appendix I of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de la relación de paquete tipos consulte Chapter 3 y en el apéndice I de la *Open Packaging Conventions* especificación está disponible para su descarga en [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package or part that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del paquete o elemento que posee la relación.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> or <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> that owns the relationship.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" /> o <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart" /> que posee la relación.

trans-unit.source: If the relationship is owned by a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> returns a URI of "/".
trans-unit.target: Si la relación pertenece a un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> devuelve un URI de "/".

trans-unit.source: If the relationship is owned by a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> returns the URI of the part.
trans-unit.target: Si la relación pertenece a un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> devuelve el URI del elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the target of the relationship is <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> to the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el destino de la relación es <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> o <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> respecto a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that indicates whether <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri" /> references a resource <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> or <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> to the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de enumeración que indica si <see cref="P:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri" /> hace referencia a un recurso <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal" /> o <see cref="F:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External" /> respecto a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> se especifica en la llamada a la **paquete**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: método que crea la relación.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Después de la relación se creará el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> no se puede cambiar.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> MUST be a relative reference.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> es <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> debe ser una referencia relativa.

trans-unit.source: For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Para una relación de nivel de paquete, hacen referencia a la relación de los <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> se resuelve en relación con el URI de paquete del paquete de origen que posee y contiene la relación.

trans-unit.source: (Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is interpreted relative to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).
trans-unit.target: (En el ejemplo se origen URI de paquete: "pack://http:,, www.adatum.com, datapak.Package /".) Para una relación de nivel de elemento, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> se resuelve en relación con la parte del origen que posee la relación (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> se interpreta en relación al <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> es <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> puede ser una referencia relativa o un URI completo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> es una referencia relativa, la referencia se interpreta en relación con la ubicación de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> que contiene esta relación.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> vea la sección 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" de la *Open Packaging Conventions* especificación está disponible para su descarga en [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target resource of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del recurso de destino de la relación.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target resource.
trans-unit.target: El valor [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del recurso de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is specified in the call to the **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> se especifica en la llamada a la **paquete**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: or **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
trans-unit.target: o **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>

trans-unit.source: method that created the relationship.
trans-unit.target: método que crea la relación.

trans-unit.source: After the relationship is created the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Después de la relación se creará el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> no se puede cambiar.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> MUST be a relative reference.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> es <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.Internal>, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> debe ser una referencia relativa.

trans-unit.source: For a package-level relationship, the relative reference of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the pack URI of the source package that owns and contains the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Para una relación de nivel de paquete, hacen referencia a la relación de los <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> se resuelve en relación con el URI de paquete del paquete de origen que posee y contiene la relación.

trans-unit.source: (Example source package pack URI: "pack://http:,,www.adatum.com,files,datapak.package/".) For a part-level relationship, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is resolved relative to the source part that owns the relationship (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is interpreted relative to <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).
trans-unit.target: (En el ejemplo se origen URI de paquete: "pack://http:,, www.adatum.com, datapak.Package /".) Para una relación de nivel de elemento, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> se resuelve en relación con la parte del origen que posee la relación (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> se interpreta en relación al <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>).

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> can be either a relative reference or a fully qualified URI.
trans-unit.target: Cuando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetMode%2A> es <xref:System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode.External>, el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> puede ser una referencia relativa o un URI completo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is a relative reference, the reference is interpreted as relative to the location of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that contains this relationship.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> es una referencia relativa, la referencia se interpreta en relación con la ubicación de la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> que contiene esta relación.

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> see Section 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> vea la sección 1.3.3 "Relationship Markup" de la *Open Packaging Conventions* especificación está disponible para su descarga en [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
